title: Dear Riot (RP matter)
body:
I was doing some (RP) shopping, and I have 124 points left.

Can I please have 1 more so I can buy a hextech chest? I promise I've been a good boy (honour level 4).

replies.body:
I don't do visual art...
I could write a song though (music is my thing).
What do Riot want? Oldskool folk blues (in open G slide), modern folk in Celtic tuning on a 12 string (DADGAD), classic blues/rock (in E standard), heavy as fuck metal in whatever tuning you want...
I can use my mandolin, banjo or accordion, or any of my many guitars.
I just want 1 more RP.
Anything creative of the sort and I imagine they will accept it, though do remember that it is up to the individual agents discretion, and you only get it once.

http://rpart.riotgames.com/na/en/

just do a crappy ms paint picture of your fav champ and send it and youll get the rp.
draw some fan art in ms paint then send a ticket and they should grant you the rp but tend to only do it once
not sure but I think you can send them fanart in a support ticket and they'll grant you up to 50rp* for when you need somethin
You can reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)  and they'll see what we can do. ^.^
